definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

definition: Three-Self Patriotic Movement, PRC government-sanctioned Protestant church from 1949
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Mo4 shi4 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶稣基督末世圣徒教会

sentences.english: Some practices in the China Church are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 中国天主教会里面有一些做法让人实在看不懂。

sentences.english: They towed the van to the church parking lot for safekeeping.
sentences.chinese: 他们把箱型车拖到教会的停车场保管。

sentences.english: The Tahitians taught Captain Cook and his sailors how to make tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 海地人教会了库克船长和他的海员们如何制作纹身。

sentences.english: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗却残害教会，进各人的家，拉着男女下在监里。

sentences.english: The residents were resettled and church services were held in the Convent.
sentences.chinese: 居民被重新安置和教会服务，被关押在女修道院。

sentences.english: They may teach you somthing you have never done.
sentences.chinese: 也许，他们还教会你不曾会做的事情。

sentences.english: So it is also in the body of Christ, the ecclesia.
sentences.chinese: 而在基督的身体里，也就是教会，那也是这样。

sentences.english: The church would not sanction his second marriage.
sentences.chinese: 教会不会认可他的第二次婚姻。

sentences.english: His list ultimately became church policy.
sentences.chinese: 他所开列的书目最终成为了教会的政策。

sentences.english: I am a therapist at columbia-presbyterian.
sentences.chinese: 我在哥伦比亚的长老派教会医院当医师。

sentences.english: He was traveling in the Low Countries, and subsequently became acquainted with the Pilgrims' church in Leiden.
sentences.chinese: 他到低地国家旅行，随后与莱顿的清教徒教会相熟。

sentences.english: The Church instituted the young man into a benefice.
sentences.chinese: 教会任命这个年轻人担任牧师一职。

sentences.english: By 1958 the government had closed all visible churches.
sentences.chinese: 及至1958年，政府関闭所有有形的教会。

sentences.english: Montanus called for less church hierarchy and more charismatic prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔努斯呼吁教会少层次和更魅力的预言。

sentences.english: If you rely on a church membe morership.
sentences.chinese: 借使你依赖教会会友的身份。

sentences.english: They have established a Chinese church near University of Kansas, Lawrence.
sentences.chinese: 并在堪萨士罗伦斯市建立一所中国人的教会。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
